attributes.action: Enforce a Zero tolerance Policy on gun Crime
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The Courts should impose the current legal limit to ALL gun Crime.
anyoneone found in possesion of a gun, should receive the full 5 year prison sentance WITH NO EXCEPTIONS,regardless of age, if the the gun is fired for whatever reason the sentance to be tripled and if someone is injured or killed they should receive a Life(until they Die) Sentence, once again with NO exceptions

We need to get tough on gun crime, and not just play at it as we have so far
